Toshiyuki "Harold" Sakata (), (July 1, 1920  July 29, 1982) was an 
American Olympic weightlifter, professional wrestler, and film actor. He won a 
silver medal for the United States at the 1948 Summer Olympics in London in 
weightlifting. He was also an actor, with his most famous role as the villain 
Oddjob in the ... Shatner in the movie Impulse, in which he played the character 
Karate Pete.
